Irma; ella tiene 43 años de edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche entre otros productos, la socia trabaja conjuntamente con su esposo, hace  un par de años que la socia se dedica a esta actividad y de esta manera la socia saca a sus hijos adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más productos para su tienda y así poder tener más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Irma is a member of the "MAMA SIMONA” community bank which is located in Poroy district, in Cusco province and department.

Irma is 43 years old, married, and has 3 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her grocery store business where she sells essentials such as rice, sugar, milk, etc.  She works together with her husband and has been in this business for a couple of years.  This is how she gets her children ahead in life.

Irma is requesting this loan to buy more products for her store so that she can offer her customers a wider variety of products.  She is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy more products for her store so that she can offer her customers more variety

loans.name: Mariana De Jesús

texts.es:
La Señora Mariana T. es socia del banco comunal Medio Ejido, vive por el sector de Medio Ejido en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es de clima frió y es reconocida por la belleza arquitectónica de su centro, su gente es muy amable y mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señora Mariana tiene 34 años de edad, es casada y tiene  3 hijos de 11, 8 y 3 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en una escuela de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesión latonero (arreglo de las latas de  vehículos) y labora en su taller propio, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando. 

Doña Mariana se dedica hace 5 años a la venta de productos Yanbal y hace 6 años a la venta de ropa, vende sus productos en sus tiempos libres ya que primero se dedica al cuidado de su hogar.
 
Se encuentra en su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa para surtir más su mercadería. Su meta es construir su casa.
texts.en:
Mariana T. is a member of the 'Medio Ejido' community bank.  She lives in Medio Ejido sector, in the city of Cuenca.  This city has a cold climate and is known for the architectural beauty of its center.  Its people are very kind and maintain their culture and traditions.

Mariana is 34 years old, married, and has 3 children aged 11, 8 and 3.  Her two eldest children study in a school in the city.  Her husband is an auto body mechanic (panel beater) who does auto body repair work in his own repair shop.  They do not own their own home but live in a rental house.

For five years, Mariana has been selling Yanbal products (cosmetics).  She has also been selling clothes for six years.  She sells her products in her spare time since her main job is to look after her home.

This is Mariana's second loan as a member of her community bank and she will invest this new loan in buying clothes to better stock her business.  Her goal is to build her own home.

loans.use: To buy clothes

loans.name: Juana  Ysidora

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Poroy, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana; ella tiene 53 años de edad, casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de verduras para luego distribuirlos a sus clientes que tiene en el Valle Sagrado (Urubamba,Calca,Ollantaytambo y Chinchero, la socia viaja cada fin de semana o en cada feria que tiene cada provincia, a la vez la socia tiene una empresa de vehículos que brinda servicio público en la ruta Cusco-Curawasi ,siendo su esposo el que administra ese negocio. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más verdura para su negocio y así poder abastecer y distribuir a todos sus clientes 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the "MAMA SIMONA” community bank which is located in Poroy district, in Cusco province and department.

Juana is 53 years old, married, and has 4 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business buying and selling vegetables which she delivers to her customers in Valle Sagrado (Urubamba, Calca, Ollantaytambo and Chinchero).  She travels every weekend or on each province's market day.  She also owns a vehicle company that provides a public service on the Cusco-Curawasi route.  Her husband runs that business.

Juana is requesting this loan to buy more vegetables for her business so that she can stock up and deliver to her customers.  She is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables for her business so that she can stock up and make deliveries to all her customers

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy fruit to sell

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: Maria Teresa de 50 años de edad es soltera, labora para la Alcaldia de Juigalpa desde hace 2 años como Secretaria del Consejo. Esta solicitando su 8vo credito con el objetivo de continuar mejorando su casa, esta vez para terminar el cuarto y construir un sumidero e instalar los servicios higienicos, para asi brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Expresa sentirse muy agradecida con kiva ya que le ha permitido mejorar su casa y brindarle a su familia mayor comodidad.
texts.en: Maria Teresa is 50 years old, single, and has worked for the City of Juigalpa as Council Secretary for two years.  She is requesting her 8th loan with the aim of continuing to improve her home.  With this loan she would like to finish a room, build a drain and install bathroom facilities so that she can provide her family with better living conditions.  She says that she feels very grateful to Kiva as they have allowed her to improve her home and provide her family with more comforts.

loans.use: To build a drain

loans.name: Juana Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Poroy, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana; ella tiene 40 años de edad, casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de verduras para luego distribuirlos a sus clientes que tiene en el Valle Sagrado (Urubamba,Calca,Ollantaytambo y Chinchero, la socia viaja cada fin de semana o en cada feria que tiene cada provincia, a la vez la socia tiene una empresa de vehículos que brinda servicio público en la ruta Cusco-Curawasi ,siendo su esposo el que administra ese negocio. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más verdura para su negocio y así poder abastecer y distribuir a todos sus clientes. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank ”Mama Simona" which is located in the Poroy district in the province and department of Cusco.   

The member's name is Sra. Juana and she is 40 years old, married, and has 5 children. The member spends her day on the various tasks of her busness of buying and selling vegetables to then distrubuting them to her customers in Valle Sagrado (Urubamba, Calca, Ollantaytambo, and Chinchero).  The member either travels every weekend or every fair day the province has.  At the same time, this member has a transportation business that provides public service on the Cusco-Curawasi route.  Her husband manages that business.  This member is taking out a loan to buy more vegetables for her business and in this way be able to stock and then distribute to all of her customers.  She is happy for the loan and promises to comply with the payments.

loans.use: This member is taking out a loan to buy more vegetables for her business and in this way be able to stock her business and distrubute it to her customers.

loans.name: Juana Eloisa

texts.es:
Juana de 47 años, hace aproximadamente tres años atrás ella inicio su negocio de venta de productos Herbalife ya que  padecía una enfermedad y los productos le ayudaron mucho para que se recuperara. 

Con dedicación y muchas motivaciones para que la gente conozca los productos naturales Herbalife ella comenzó a venderlos a diferentes conocidos y amigos. Poco a poco la fueron conociendo hasta ahora que trabaja de lunes a domingo promocionándolos y vendiéndolos en un local por el sector donde vive. Vende productos a base de  Noni, frutas etc. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones para seguir con el negocio porque le ayudo con su salud por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar más de los productos. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa y poder incrementa su negocio.
texts.en:
Juana is 47 years old and about 3 years ago she started  her business selling Herbalife products because she suffered from an illness and the products really helpd her in her recovery.  

Being very motivated and dedicated to making people aware of Herbalife natural products, she began to sell them to various aquaintences and friends.  Bit-by-bit they became familiar with the products until she began working from Monday to Sunday promoting and selling them from a stand in her neighborhood.  She sells Noni based products, fruits etc.   

She has many aspirations to continue the business because it helped her with her health which is why she wants a loan to buy more products. In the future she wants to finish building her house and to increase her business.

loans.use: Noni based natural products and fruits.

loans.name: Maria Rosario

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Poroy, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria Rosario; ella tiene 28 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de desayunos como quinua con leche o solo quinua y por las noches vende lonche como cafe, mates entre otros la socia trabaja de forma independiente y ambulatoria, la socia es una persona muy emprendedora con muchas ganas de seguir adelante por sus hijos.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más insumos para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maria Rosario is a member of the ”MAMA SIMONA” which is located in Poroy district, in Cusco province and department.

Maria Rosario is 28 years old.  She lives with her partner and has 3 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling breakfasts such as quinoa with milk or just quinoa.  In the evenings she also sells drinks such as coffee, matés (infusions) etc.  She works independently as an itinerant street vendor.  Maria Rosario is a very enterprising person who has a great desire to get ahead for her children's sake.

Maria Rosario is requesting this loan to buy more supplies for her business.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy more supplies for her business

loans.name: Solteritas Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal Solteritas, es un grupo de 8 mujeres que ha decidido unirse para recibir crédito, capacitación y atención en salud.  Esta Banca Comunal es parte del centro focal de Senkata, este es su primer ciclo.
Cada una de ellas tienen negocios propios de diferentes tipos, como ser: venta de fruta, crianza de ovejas, tienda de barrio, costura de edredones, venta de verduras y frutas.
Para su organización, la B.C. Solteritas cuenta con una mesa directiva integrada por una presidenta, una tesorera y una secretaria de actas.
 
La Presidenta, la señora Desideria, es una mujer de 54 años de edad, casada, madre de 6 hijos, quienes a la fecha ya son mayores de edad. (más de 18 años).  El negocio de la señora Desideria es la venta de plástico y chinelas y tiene su propia tienda de barrio.  Con orgullo comenta que aprendió el negocio desde los 18 años, sus hermanos le enseñaron.  Cada cierto tiempo viaja con chinelas a poblaciones cercanas como Caranavi.  Cuando se queda en su tienda,  se dedica a vender desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las nueve de la noche.
La señora Desideria está regresando como cliente de Pro Mujer después de cuatro años, cuando se le consulta que es lo que le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde “el ahorro que se junta”.
texts.en:
The Solteritas community bank is a group of 8 women who decided to join together in order to access loans, training and health services.  This community bank is part of the Senkata regional office and they are in their first loan cycle.

Each woman has her own business.  Their businesses include: selling fruit, raising sheep, running a neighborhood store, sewing comforters and selling fruit and vegetables.

The Solteritas community bank has a board of directors which is made up of a president, a treasurer and a secretary.  The bank's president, Desideria, is a 54 year-old woman.  She is married and has six children who are all grown up (older than 18).

Desideria's business is selling plastic items and thongs (flip flops).  She also has her own neighborhood store.  With pride she tells us that she was taught the business 18 years ago by her siblings.  Every so often she travels with her flip flops to nearby towns such as Caranavi.  When she is in her store, she serves from 6.00am to 9.00pm.  Desideria is returning as a client of Pro Mujer after an absence of four years.  When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer she replied "the savings that we make".

loans.use: To buy beer

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Julio Cesar de 30 años de edad es casado, tiene una hija, labora para como Perito Agricola de hace 5½ años. Esta solicitando  su 2do credito con el objetivo de continuar mejorando su casa construyendo la cocina, con pantry y poner el piso. Cabe señalar que el credito anterior tambien lo utilizo para mejorar su casa y espera poder continuar haciendolo, ya que su mayor deseo es que su familia cuente con mejores comodidades.
texts.en:
Julio Cesar is 30 years old, married and has one daughter.  He has worked for Perito Agrícola for 5½ years.  He is requesting his second loan with the aim of continuing to improve his home by building his kitchen, with a pantry, and putting down flooring.  

We should point out that Julio Cesar also used his previous loan to improve his home and he hopes to be able to continue to do so since his biggest wish is to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: To build a pantry

loans.name: Ana Marina

texts.es: Ana Marina de 35 años de edad es casada, labora para la Alcaldia de Juigalpa desde hace 11 años como operador auxliar SISREC. Esta solicitando su 4to credito con el objetivo de poner el piso a su casa, pues desea darles este regalo navideño  a sus hijas. Expresa sentirse muy agradecida con el apoyo brindado por la financiera, pues gracias a los creditos ha podido mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Ana Marina is 35 years old and married.  She has worked for the City of Juigalpa for 11 years as an assistant SISREC operator.  She is requesting her fourth loan with the goal of putting down flooring in her home as she would like to provide this Christmas present to her daughters.  She says that she feels very grateful for the support offered to her by the finance company since, thanks to her loans, she has been able to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To put down flooring

loans.name: Marcia Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señora. Marcia C. es socia del banco comunal Arco Iris, vive por la comunidad de 3 Marías en donde su gente en especial los adultos se dedica a la cría de animales y agricultura, mucha de su gente en la ciudad ha encontrado un trabajo con el cual ayudan a la economía de sus hogares.

La Señora. Marcia tiene 28 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 8 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando en una escuela de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como albañil y con el esfuerzo conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia.

Doña Marcia labora en una fábrica en donde realiza Jeans, esta actividad la realiza hace 4 años, trabaja desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 5 y media de la tarde de lunes a viernes. En su casa se dedica a la cría de chanchos y pollos los que vende en su comunidad.

Es socia del banco comunal hace 6 años y  su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de unas ventanas para su casa ya que aun le hacen falta algunos detalles para terminarla por completo. Su meta el de terminar su casa.
texts.en:
Marcia C. is a member of the 'Arco Iris' (Rainbow) community bank.  She lives in the community of '3 Marías' whose inhabitants, especially the adults, work raising animals and farming.  Many of the community's residents have also found work in the city which allows them to help their households financially.

Marcia is 28 years old, married and has 2 children aged 9 and 8.  Her children are studying in an elementary school in the city.  Her husband works as a construction worker and, through their joint efforts, they have managed to build their own home.

Marcia works in a factory where she makes jeans.  She has been doing this job for 4 years.  She works from 8.00am to 5.30pm, Monday to Friday.  At home she raises pigs and chickens which she sells in her community.

Marcia has been a member of her community bank for 6 years and she will invest her new loan in buying some windows for her home since she and her husband are still lacking some details in order to finish it completely.  Her goal is to finish her house.

loans.use: To buy windows

loans.name: Bertha Maria

texts.es:
Bertha de 54 años, es una mujer trabajadora que hace dos años atrás comenzó a vender pollos en un puesto de la calle con su cuñada para generar más ingresos para el hogar. 

Viviendo en una zona del suburbio poco a poco con esfuerzo y dedicación ha sido conocida por los moradores del sector por las ventas de pollos a un bajo costo. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 06h00am vendiendo pollos hasta las 12h00 de la tarde. Una de las complicaciones para vender los pollos es la delincuencia que hay en el sector.   

En el futuro quiere tener un local para su negocio ya que ahora tiene el puesto en la calle por eso quiere seguir trabajando y comprar con el préstamo mas pollos para tener más ingresos.
texts.en:
Bertha is 54 years old.  She is a hard-working woman who, two years ago, started selling chickens from a stall in the street with her sister-in-law in order to make more income for her household.

Bertha lives in El Suburbio and gradually, through hard work and commitment, she has become known by the area's residents for the low-priced chicken she sells.  She currently works from 6.00am to 12.00pm selling chicken.

One of the problems Bertha has had in selling her chickens is the crime that exists in her area.  In the future, she would like to have premises for her business since right now she has a stall in the street.  For this reason, she would like to continue working and use her loan to buy more chickens in order to make more income.

loans.use: To buy chickens

loans.name: Santa Anastacia

texts.en:
Santa Anastacia is a 34 year old entrepreneur. She is married and has two children who go to public school. Her husband is master bricklayer. They live in Guayaquil, in an area called Duran (now an urban area this region was originally wild, with numerous hills, streams, and lakes; these are still present but the feeling of being in a natural environment is slowly dissolving).
Santa Anastacia knew how to repair bicycles and since there was no other business in the area offering the same services, she decided to start her own bicycle repair shop. She works every day from 8am until 6pm.
The biggest problem for her business is that in her neighborhood the roads are not paved. She plans to use her $800 loan to buy spare parts and to improve her workshop. 
In the future she hopes to have a house made of concrete; right now her house is made in part of brick and in part of cane.

loans.use: To buy spare part for bicycles

loans.name: Dolores Del Carmen

texts.es: Dolores de 41 años de edad es soltera, labora para la Alcaldia de Juigalpa desde hace 6 años como Contadora General. Esta solicitando su 4to credito con el objetivo de construir un cuarto, ya que esta esperando su segundo hijo y desea contar con mejores condiciones en la casa. Cabe señalar que anteriormente utilizo su credito para realizar mejoras a su casa, pues desea brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Dolores is 41 years old, single, and has worked for the City of Juigalpa for 6 years as their General Accountant.  She is requesting her fourth loan with the goal of building a room since she is expecting her second child and would like to have better conditions in her home.  We should point out that Dolores used a previous loan to make improvements to her home as she is keen to provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: To build a room

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Poroy, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Estela; ella tiene 32 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de chicha de jora esto (hecho a base de maíz), la socia lo elabora para luego distribuirlo a sus clientes que son especialmente las chicherías que se encuentran ubicados en Poroy, la socia es una persona muy emprendedora que lleva años en este negocio, y de esta forma saca a su familia adelante.  

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más insumos  para su negocio como maíz azúcar entre otros más, y también para la compra de bloquetas para la construcción de su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Estela is a member of the "MAMA SIMONA” which is located in Poroy district, in Cusco province and department.

Estela is 32 years old.  She lives with her partner and has 3 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling 'chicha de jora' (a corn-based drink).  She makes her 'chicha' and then distributes it to her customers, including chicherías located in Poroy.  Estela is a very enterprising person who has been in this business for years.  This is how she gets her family ahead in life.

Estela is requesting this loan to buy more supplies for her business such as corn, sugar, etc.  She will also buy blocks for building her home.  Estela is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy more supplies for her business such as corn, sugar, etc.  She will also buy blocks for building her home

loans.name: Mariana De Jesús

texts.es:
La Señora. Mariana C. es socia del banco comunal Arco Iris, vive por la comunidad de 3 Marías en donde su gente en especial los adultos se dedica a la cría de animales y agricultura, mucha de su gente en la ciudad ha encontrado un trabajo con el cual ayudan a la economía de sus hogares.

Doña Mariana se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y aprovecha el tiempo en su casa para la agricultura, vende sus productos en la feria libre (mercado de Cuenca), también se dedica a la cría de animales los que vende en su propia comunidad.

La Señora Mariana tiene 53 años, es casada y tiene 5 hijos de 29, 28, 24, 21 y 19 años de edad, cuarto hijos viven independientes, su cuatro hijo trabajan y ayuda en la economía del hogar. Su esposo es jubilado y pasa en casa, con el trabajo conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia.
 
Es socia fundadora del banco comunal y se encuentra en ella hace 6 años, su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y en su alimento.  Su meta es de tener más animales para la venta.
texts.en:
Mariana C. is a member of the "Arco Iris" (Rainbow) community bank and lives in the community of "3 Marías" whose residents, especially the adults, work raising animals and farming.  Many of the people have also found work in the city through which they help their households financially.

Mariana does her housework and takes advantage of the time she spends at home to farm.  She sells her products in the 'feria libre' (Cuenca market).  She also raises animals which she sells in her own community.

Mariana is 53 years old and has 5 children aged 29, 28, 24, 21 and 19.  Four of her children live independently.  They work and help the household financially.  Her husband is retired and at home.  Through their joint work, they have managed to build their own home.

Mariana is a founding member of her community bank and has been a member for 6 years.  She will invest her new loan in buying chickens and feed.  Her goal is to have more animals to sell.

loans.use: To buy chickens and animal feed

loans.name: Marcia Pastora

texts.es: Marcia Pastora de 45 años de edad es soltera, labora para el MINED desde hace 25 años en la Escuela San Nicolas del Municipio de San Esteban. Esta solicitando  su 8vo credito con el objetivo de poner las verjas al porchecito de su casa, ya que solo tiene levantado la pared hasta la mitad y desea ponerle verjas al resto y contar con mayor seguridad. Expresa que gracias a los creditos obtenidos en AFODENIC ha podido ir mejorando poco a poco su casita y espera seguir contando con el apoyo de esta para continuar mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Marcia Pastora, 45, is single.  She’s been employed by the Ministry of Education for 25 years at the town of San Esteban’s San Nicolás School.  She is asking for her 8th loan to install iron grilles on her house’s porch because the walls are only built up half way and she wants to install grilles on the rest in order to have better security.

She expresses her thanks for the loans gotten at AFODENIC.  She has been able to gradually improve her little house and hopes to continue to be able to count on this support in order to continue to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: To install iron grilles on the porch.

loans.name: Rossmery

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Poroy, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rossmery; ella tiene 28 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas y patos, la socia después lo distribuye a sus clientes que son los restaurantes y personas en general que le solicitan, sus clientes también se encuentran en Cusco y parte del Valle Sagrado 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más animales para su negocio y así poder tener más variedad de animales para  poder ofrecer a sus clientes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rossmery is a member of the "MAMA SIMONA” community bank which is located in Poroy district, in Cusco province and department.

Rossmery is 28 years old.  She lives with her partner and has 3 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business raising animals such as guinea pigs, chickens and ducks which she then distributes to her customers, including restaurants and people in general who request them.  Her customers are also to be found in Cusco and parts of Valle Sagrado.

Rossmery is requesting this loan to buy more animals for her business so that she can have a greater variety of animals to offer her customers.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy more animals for her business so that she has a greater variety of animals to offer her customers

loans.name: Gladys Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señora. Gladys M. es socia del banco comunal Arco Iris, vive por la comunidad de 3 Marías en donde su gente en especial los adultos se dedica a la cría de animales y agricultura, mucha de su gente en la ciudad ha encontrado un trabajo con el cual ayudan a la economía de sus hogares.

Nuestra socia tiene 35 años, es casada y tiene  gemelos de 17 años que estudian en un colegio de la ciudad y una niña  de 10 años que estudia en una escuela del sector. Su esposo labora como albañil y con el trabajo conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia.

La Señora Gladys se dedica a trabajar en el arreglo de casas, esta actividad la realiza hace 4 años, trabaja desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 12 del medio día de lunes a viernes y el resto de su tiempo lo dedica a la cría de sus animales como cuyes y pollos los que vende en su comunidad.

Se encuentra en su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a utilizar para la compra de más pollos y en su alimento. Su meta es terminar su casa.
texts.en:
Gladys M. is a member of the 'Arco Iris' (Rainbow) community bank.  She lives in the community of '3 Marías' whose residents, especially the adults, work raising animals and farming.  Many of the people have also found work in the city through which they help their households financially.

Gladys is 35 years old, married and has 17 year-old twins, who are studying at a high school in the city, and a 10 year-old daughter who is studying in a local elementary school.  Her husband is a construction worker and, through their joint work, they have managed to build their own home.

Gladys works as a domestic employee.  She has been in this business for 4 years.  She works from 8.00am to 12.00pm, from Monday to Friday, and the rest of the time she raises animals such as guinea pigs and chickens which she sells in her community.

This is Gladys' second loan through her community bank and she will use it to buy more chickens and chicken feed.  Her goal is to finish her house.

loans.use: To buy chickens and animal feed

loans.name: Rosa Amelia

texts.es: Rosa Amelia de 41 años de edad es casada, tiene 2 hijos la mayor estudia la universidad y el menor esta en edad preescolar; Rosa Amelia labora para el MINED de Acoyapa como docente desde hace 20 años. Esta solicitando  su 9no credito con el objetivo de poner la ceramica al piso de su casa ya que actualmente solo esta embaldosado y desea ver mas bonita su sala, ademas si el dinero lo permite desea poner azulejos al baño, para asi ir mejorando su vivienda y poder darle a sus hijos un ambiente digno.  En la foto Rosa Amelia esta con su hijo menor de 4 añitos.
texts.en: Rosa Amelia is 41 years old, married, and has two children.  Her eldest child is studying at university and her youngest is a preschooler.  Rosa Amelia has worked as a teacher for the Ministry of Education in Acoyapa for 20 years.  She is requesting her 9th loan with the goal of laying ceramic tiles on the floor of her home as she would like  her living room to be more beautiful.  Also, if the money stretches far enough, she would like to put glazed, ceramic tiles in her bathroom so that she can continue improving her home and provide her children with a decent environment.

loans.use: To lay ceramic tiles

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to develop the farm by purchasing chicken coops

loans.name: Copacabana Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal Copacabana, es un grupo de 8 mujeres que han decidido unirse para recibir crédito, capacitación y atención en salud.  Esta Banca Comunal es parte del centro focal de Senkata.
Cada una de ellas tienen negocios propios de diferentes tipos, como ser: costura de chamarras, venta de papa y chuño, venta de papas fritas, venta de desodorante y perfumes, elaboración de papas fritas, venta de papa y chuño, carpintería.

Para su organización, la B.C. Copacabana cuenta con una mesa directiva integrada por una presidenta, la señora Ines, una tesorera, la señora Petrona y una secretaria de actas, la señora Sonia.
 
La Presidenta, la señora Ines, es una mujer de 32 años de edad, vive con su pareja y sus tres hijos.   El negocio de la señora Ines es la venta de papas fritas, ella comenta que antes trabajaba como empleada elaborando papas fritas y así aprendió su oficio.
La señora  Ines vende su producción de manera ambulante, entregando por mayor a las tiendas de la calle Tumusla.  Ahora solicita el crédito para aumentar su capital.
texts.en:
The community bank Copacabana is a group of 8 women that have decided to unite to get credit, training, and healthcare. This community bank is located in the center of Senkata.  Each one of the members has her own business.  The types of businesses vary and include handmade jackets, potato and potato flour sales, french fries sales, deodorant and perfume sales, and carpentry.  

Copacabana Community Bank has an executive committee comprised of a president (Ines), a treasurer (Petrona) and a secretary (Sonia). President Ines is a 32-year-old woman and lives with her spouse and three children.  Ines sells french fries.  Before she started this business she worked as an employee making french fries, and in this way, learned her trade.  Ines sells what she produces from door-to-door, selling wholesale to the stores on Tumusla Street.  She is now requesting this loan to increase her capital.

loans.use: To buy potatoes and oil

loans.name: Osmar Guadalupe

texts.es: Osmar de 29 años de edad es soltero, tiene 6 años de trabajar para la Alcaldia de Juigalpa como operario de limpieza; esta solicitando su 2do credito con el objetivo de construir un cuarto en su casa para asi de esta manera poder brindarle  mejores condiciones de vida a su familia. Su mayor sueño es poder seguir mejorando su casita para poder darle a su familia mayores comodidades.
texts.en: Osmar, 29, is single and for the past 6 years has worked as a cleaning man for the mayor's office of Juigalpa.  He is requesting his second loan to build a room in his house so that he can give his family better living standards.  His biggest dream is to be able to improve his little house and offer his family greater comfort.

loans.use: To build a room

loans.name: Hector

texts.es: Hector de 39 años de edad es casado, tiene 19 años de trabajar para la Alcaldia de Juigalpa como operario de limpieza; esta solicitando su 4to credito con el objetivo de construir un cuarto en su casa para asi de esta manera poder brindarle  mejores condiciones de vida a su familia. Sueña con poder tener una casa con las condiciones basicas del hogar para que su familia se sienta comoda y feliz.
texts.en: Hector, 39, is married and has been working in public sanitation for the municipality of Juigalpa for 19 years.  He is requesting his 4th loan, with the objective of adding a room to his house.  In this way, he can provide better living conditions for his family.  He dreams of being able to have a house outfitted with all of the basic necessities so that his family can feel comfortable and content.

loans.use: to build a room

loans.name: Yusra

texts.en:
Yusra is an elementary school teacher and her husband is a taxi driver. Yusra is the mother of two daughters and two sons aged from 2 to 10 years old. Yusra had to borrow money from relatives to purchase needed furniture, such couches and chairs, for her house. Yusra came to FATEN to get a loan to repay her relatives.

Yusra's husband appears in the photo, taken in FATEN's branch in Qalqilia, as Yusra is a religious woman.

loans.use: to repay a loan for furniture

loans.name: Casiana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Poroy, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Casiana; ella tiene 62 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche entre otros productos, la socia lleva años en este negocio del cual se siente muy feliz ya que le brinda mucho tipo de satisfacciones ya que también es una forma de distracción para ella, y mediante este negocio la socia aun ayuda a sus hijos cuando lo necesitan. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más productos para su negocio y así poder tener más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Casiana belongs to the Mama Simona Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Poroy district, Cusco province, Cusco department.  She is 62 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has six children.  She alternates her daily activities with working in her business, a grocery store.  

She sells basic needs items like rice, sugar, and milk, among other products.  She has had this business for years.  She is very happy because it satisfies her in many ways.  It is also entertaining for her.  Through this business she can still help her children when they need it.

She is requesting the loan to buy more products for her business.  That way she will be able to offer her customers more variety.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make all of her payments.

loans.use: To buy more products for her business in order to have a greater variety to offer her customers

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.es:
Hilaria, tiene 47 años, vive con su esposo y sus cinco hijos en el distrito de Poroy de la ciudad del Cusco. El distrito de Poroy se encuentra ubicado a 25 minutos de la plaza de armas de la capital arqueológica de América del Sur (Cusco). 

Hilaria tiene un pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio, ella abre la tienda muy temprano para vender sus productos y cierra a aproximadamente a las 9 de la noche. Hace varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va regular. 
Hilaria espera recibir S/.1000 nuevos soles de crédito y utilizará este dinero para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar y otra parte del dinero será para uso personal.  

Hilaria pertenece al banco comunal “Mama Simona” de la UMF Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el quinto año de funcionamiento y está bien administrado por la junta directiva.

Cusco es una ciudad encantadora que se remonta a los tiempos de los Incas, la ciudad del Cusco está construida en la base de la antigua ciudadela Inca.
texts.en:
Hilaria, age 47, lives with her husband and their five children in the Poroy district in the city of Cusco.  The Poroy district is 25 minutes from the Plaza de Armas in the archaeological capital of South America (Cusco).

Hilaria has a small grocery store in her home.  She opens the store very early in order to sell her products.  She closes the store around nine at night.  She has had this business for several years, and it is steady.

Hilaria hopes to receive a loan for S/.1000 nuevos soles.  She will use it to buy merchandise like rice and sugar.  Part of the money will be for personal use.

Hilaria belongs to the Mama Simona Communal Bank with the UMF (Microfinance Unit) Asociación Arariwa. The community bank has been going for five years and is well run by its board of directors.

Cusco is a delightful city which dates back to Incan times. The city of Cusco is built on the site of the ancient Incan citadel.

loans.use: To buy rice and sugar.  Part of the loan will be for personal use.

loans.name: Los Girasoles De Compone Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “LOS GIRASOLES DE COMPONE”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Iscuchaka, la provincia de Anta y departamento del Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Modesta; La socia tiene 56 años de edad, la socia es conviviente y tiene 6 hijos; La socia se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores; la socia compra cuyes, aves de corral como pollos, gallinas, gallos, la socia también se dedica a la compra y venta de leche, la socia trabaja de forma independiente y es así como ella desea continuar ya que es rentable su forma de trabajo, la socia tiene vacas junto a su conyugue y ella vende la leche que las vacas producen y una vez por semana elabora quesos y yogur. La socia desea el préstamo para invertir en la compra de animales menores para incrementar su negocio, la socia comprara cuyes y aves al por mayor. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de animales menores.

Los otros socios se dedican a la agricultura, otras venden leche y derivados como queso y yogur, otros socios venden verduras, maíz.

La socia valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Modesta belongs to the “Los Girasoles de Compone” (The Compone Sunflowers) Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Escuchaka district, Anta province, Cusco department.

Modesta is 56 years old, married, and has six children.  She raises small animals.  She buys guinea pigs and poultry like chickens, hens, and roosters.  She also buys and sells milk.  She works in an independent manner.  That is how she wishes to continue because this type of work is profitable.

She and her husband have cows.  She sells the milk that the cows produce.  Once a week she makes cheeses and yogurt.

She wants the loan to buy small animals in order to expand her business.  She will buy guinea pigs and birds wholesale.  She is requesting the loan to buy small animals.

Other members are farmers.  Some sell milk and its derivatives like cheese and yogurt.  Other members sell vegetables and corn.

She values the loan and pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To buy small animals

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es:
Luzmila, tiene 31 años, vive con su pareja y sus tres hijos en el distrito de Poroy de la ciudad del Cusco. El distrito de Poroy se encuentra ubicado a 25 minutos de la plaza de armas de la capital arqueológica de América del Sur (Cusco). 

Luzmila tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de jugo de naranja de forma ambulatoria en el paradero de los carros que salen a la ciudad del Cusco y también vende helados de todos los sabores como por ejemplo de piña, fresa, mango y muchos más. Hace varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va regular. 

Luzmila espera recibir S/.300 nuevos soles de crédito y utilizará este dinero para comprar insumos como por ejemplo naranjas, colorantes, frutas frescas, azúcar  y muchas cosas más. 

Luzmila pertenece al banco comunal “Mama Simona” de la UMF Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el quinto año de funcionamiento y está bien administrado por la junta directiva.

Luzmila has a small business selling orange juice.  She makes her sales as an itinerant street vendor at the bus station where buses leave  the city of Cusco.  She also sells ice creams in all flavors such as, for example, pineapple, strawberries, mango, and many others.  She has been in this business for several years and it is going OK.

Luzmila hopes to receive 300 Peruvian soles and she will use the money to buy supplies such as, for example, oranges, colorings, fresh fruit, sugar, etc.  Luzmila is a member of Asociación Arariwa's "Mama Simona" community bank.  The community bank has been running for five years and it is well managed by its board of directors.

Cusco is a delightful city which dates back to Incan times.  The city of Cusco is built on the site of the ancient Incan citadel.

loans.use: To buy oranges, colorings, fresh fruit, sugar and many other supplies

Naema is a working mother who wants to help her husband who appears in the photo in the location where he buys metal construction bars.

loans.use: to purchase a metal cutting machine

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa M. is from the city of Kinuman norte Ozamiz City. She is 36 years old. Elsa is married and has 4 school-aged children. To make a living, Elsa owns & operates a business venture in the agriculture sector raising livestock. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from raising pigs for sale. Elsa has been engaged in her business for over 6 years and earns approximately 2500 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2010, Elsa joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Elsa is requesting a new loan of 5000 PHP which will be used to invest in expanding the business. This loan will be the first loan taken out by Elsa from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of the borrower's family. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to invest in expanding the business

loans.name: Muhammad

texts.en: Muhammad is a Palestinian National Authority employee and the father of two daughters (Sally, 6 years old; Jihan, 5 years old) and one son (Naem, 3 years old). Muhammad has been unable to pay his electricity bill for a long time because he didn't receive his salary due to the unstable situation in the Gaza Strip. Now that his paycheck is back to normal, Muhammad took a loan from FATEN to pay the bill.

loans.use: to pay off the electricity bill

loans.name: Majeda

texts.en:
Majeda F. is a young woman from Bethlehem. Majeda takes care of her own family, which consists of three sisters and one brother who are in school and at college.

Majeda owns a kindergarten in Bethlehem. She started her school nine years ago in one of the rooms in her family's house so she would have a nice, big space for the kindergarten. She is always striving to make her kindergarten the best in the city.

Majeda requested a loan from FATEN to replace the old carpeting and purchase educational and recreational toys, as well as other items needed for the children.

Majeda and the children in her kindergarten appear in the picture above.

Liesel has successfully repaid a previous loan from GDMPC. Liesel is requesting a new loan of 20000 PHP which will be used to invest in expanding the business. This loan will be the sixth loan taken out by Liesel from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of the borrower's family. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to invest in expanding the business

loans.name: Arturo Hernan

texts.es:
Arturo tiene 28 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su familia en el distrito de Lambayeque, una zona de bastante movimiento comercial que se encuentra situada a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

El se gana la vida trabajando como coreógrafo. Arturo tiene una pequeña escuela de danza en donde enseña a bailar a personas  de todas las edades. Su calidad de enseñanza le han hecho bastante conocido y actualmente es bastante estimado por la zona. Los ingresos que el obtiene de esta actividad le ayudan a sacar adelante a su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida.

Actualmente Arturo desea adquirir espejos, colchonetas y otros materiales que le ayuden a mejorar la calidad de atención en su escuela de baile. Para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Arturo is 28 years old, married and lives with his family in the the Lambayeque district, a very active commercial area located 20 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.
 
Arturo earns a living as a choreographer. He runs a small dance school where he teaches people of all ages. He offers high-quality instruction, which has made him very well-known and earned him a good reputation throughout the area. The income he earns from his work helps him to raise his family and improve their quality of life.
 
Arturo is requesting a loan from Edypme Alternativa in the amount of $725. This loan will help him reach his goal of purchasing mirrors, mats, and other materials to improve the quality of his dance school.

loans.use: To purchase mirrors, mats, and other materials to improve the quality of his dance school.

loans.name: Fibie

texts.en:
Fibie D. is from the village of Sinonoc,Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She is 51 years old. Fibie is married and has 2 school-aged children. To make a living, Fibie owns and operates a business venture in the agriculture sector raising crops. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from planting and harvesting a variety of vegetables for sale. Fibie has been engaged in her business for over five years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2007, Fibie joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Fibie has successfully repaid a previous loan of 50,000 PHP from GDMPC. This previous loan was used to additional capital for her business. Fibie is requesting a new loan of 50000 PHP which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. This loan will be the sixth loan taken out by Fibie from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand the borrower's business. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure for her crops

loans.name: Maria Confesora

texts.es:
María Confesora tiene 68 años D. edad y vive junto a su familia en el distrito D. Nueva Arica, un distrito con geografía bastante accidentada debido a su cercanía a la sierra norte del país, su principal actividad es la agricultura, aunque cuentan con pocas áreas fértiles, se encuentra situado a una hora y media D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo.

María se dedica desD. hace 30 años a vender productos D. primera necesidad y abarrotes en una bodega instalada en su vivienda, ella nos comenta que su negocio nació D. la necesidad D. agenciarse D. un ingreso con el cual sacar adelante a su familia, empezó vendiendo pocos productos y ahora, gracias a su esfuerzo, su negocio ha crecido y cuenta con una clientela fija que acuD. siempre a consumir sus productos.

Ella compra productos D. primera necesidad en la ciudad D. Chiclayo y trata siempre D. ofrecer productos frescos (verduras, frutas) a sus clientes, su negocio es uno D. los mas surtidos en la zona por lo que es D. mucha ayuda para la comunidad, el distrito D. Nueva Arica es una comunidad con pocos habitantes (14 habitantes por Km2).

María Confesora ya ha tenido un crédito financiado por el fondo Kiva a través D. Edpyme Alternativa y su producto Capital Semilla. En aquella oportunidad ella solicitó el crédito para ampliar su negocio y poder satisfacer la demanda con la que contaba. Gracias a esta ampliación la acogida por su bodega ha crecido bastante y actualmente su demanda ha aumentado considerablemente. Por ello ha creído conveniente realizar una nueva ampliación adquiriendo más productos. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1000 nuevos soles.

María se encuentra bastante agradecida con las personas que han colaborado con ella a través del fondo Kiva.
texts.en:
María Confesora is 68 years old and lives with her family in the Nueva Arica district, located about an hour from the city of Chiclayo. It is a very rugged area situated near the mountains of the northern part of Peru.  The district of Nueva Arica is sparsely populated (14 people per square kilometer). Her main source of income is derived from agriculture, although she has access to few fertile areas.
 
For 30 years, María has worked selling staple goods and groceries from a store attached to her home.  Her business was born from the need to earn an income in order do proviD. for her family. Initially, she sold only a few products but now, because of her hard work, her business has grown and she has established a solid customer base which regularly buys her products.
 
María buys staple goods in Chiclayo and always strives to offer her clients fresh products (fruits and vegetables). Her business is one of the most well-supplied in the area and is a great support for the community. 
 
Maria has previously received a loan funded by Kiva, through Edpyme Alternativa's "Seed Money" program. At that time she applied for a loan in order to expand her business and to keep up with the level of demand. Thanks to this growth her store has become better known and currently demand has reached new heights. Therefore, she has seen the need to expand again and offer more products. To achieve this goal María is requesting a loan of $375 from Edpyme Alternativa.
 
Maria is very grateful to the those who have helped her through Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase goods to expand her store.

loans.name: Flordelisa

texts.en:
Flordelisa V. is from the village of Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga Del Sur. She is 37 years old. Flordelisa is married and has one school-aged child. To make a living, Flordelisa owns and operates a business venture in the agriculture sector raising livestock. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from raising pigs for sale. Flordelisa is just starting this business.

In 2007, Flordelisa joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Flordelisa has successfully repaid a previous loan of 7000 PHP from GDMPC. This previous loan was used to to purchase livestock feed and other supplies. Flordelisa is requesting a new loan of 12000 PHP which will be used to invest in expanding the business. This loan will be the third loan taken out by Flordelisa from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of the borrower's family. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to invest in expanding the business

loans.name: Jose Carlos

texts.es:
José Carlos es un padre de familia de 46 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a sus dos hijos en el sector Las Adelinas del distrito de Cayaltí, un distrito agrícola de movimiento comercial considerable ubicado a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores agrícolas desde hace más de diez años, el cuenta con un terreno de cultivo en el cual suele sembrar diversos cultivos como arroz y maíz, debido a la abundancia de agua para regadíos en la zona, se suele sembrar estos cultivos hasta dos veces por año, a diferencia de otras zonas de la región en las cuales se siembra solo una vez. Este cereal es bastante consumido en el país por lo que su cultivo es bastante importante en la alimentación de las familias peruanas.

José Carlos depende de esta actividad para solventar los gastos de su familia por lo que siempre trata de entregar lo mejor de sí para sacar a su cultivo adelante. Actualmente desea instalar su cultivo de maíz por lo que desea preparar su terreno aplicando algunos nutrientes. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído necesario solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles. 

José Carlos ya ha tenido un crédito financiado por el fondo Kiva a través de Edpyme Alternativa y su producto Capital Semilla. En aquella oportunidad el pudo sacar adelante un cultivo de arroz gracias a este préstamo y debido a ello pudo asegurarle a su familia el sustento. Por este motivo se encuentra bastante agradecido con las personas que colaboraron con él a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
José Carlos is a 46 year-old father who lives together with his wife and two children in Las Adelinas sector of Cayaltí district, an agricultural district with considerable commercial activity which is located one hour from the city of Chiclayo.

José Carlos has worked in agriculture for more than ten years.  He owns a plot of farmland where he grows a number of crops including rice and corn.  Owing to the abundance of irrigation water in the area, these crops are usually planted up to twice a year, unlike in other areas of the region where they are sown only once.

This cereal is widely consumed in the country which means that its cultivation is quite important for feeding Peruvian families.  José Carlos depends on this business to cover his family's expenses which is why he always works his hardest in order to succeed in his production.  He would currently like to sow his corn crop and would therefore like to prepare his land, applying some nutrients.  In order to achieve his goal, he is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles through Edpyme Alternativa and their 'Seed Capital' product.

José Carlos will be able to use this loan to get ahead with his rice crop and thereby support his family.  For this reason, he is grateful to those who are working with him through Kiva.

loans.use: To prepare his land, applying some nutrients

loans.name: Alcira

texts.es:
Alcira tiene 63 años D. edad, es casada y resiD. junto a su esposo ya a su hijo en el distrito D. Chulucanas, una zona agrícola que pertenece a la provincia D. Morropón y se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a más D. tres horas y media D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo, capital D. la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a trabajar en la crianza D. ganado ovino y vacuno. El cuanta con un grupo considerable D. ovejas las cuales cría en corrales situados cerca a su domicilio. Cuando esta se han desarrollado completamente las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que visitan la zona y al público en gerenal. Adicionalmente cuenta con algunas vacas D. las cuales aprovecha la leche que producen para venderla a sus vecinos. Esta actividad le ayuda a sentirse activa y le permite ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento D. la economía familiar.

Alcira desea invertir en alimento balanceado para sus animales D. modo que estos se puedan desarrollar D. mejor modo y le brinden mayores ingresos por sus ventas. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su meta trazada
texts.en:
Alcira is 63, married and lives with her husband and a son in the Chulucanas district, a farming area in Morropón province of the Piura region, about three and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.

She raises cattle, sheep and cows.  She has a large herd of sheep that she keeps in a corral near her house.  When they are full-grown, she offers them up for sale to the merchants who come through the area, and to the general public.  She also has cows from which she gets milk that she then sells to her neighbors.  This business helps her feel active and allows her to help her husband with supporting the family.

Alcira wants to buy balanced food for her animals so that they can grow best for the highest income when they are sold.  To achieve this objective she decided to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1000 new sols that will help her reach her planned goal.

loans.use: To buy balanced food for her animals.

loans.name: Chhou

texts.en: Chhou S. is a widow woman who lives in the province of Banteay Meanchey. Chhou S. sells fish-paste which she buys from the wholesalers and she takes to resell in the local market, and she could earn a profit in average $4 a day for supporting in the family expense. Her husband died of senility for many years ago. She currently lives with five children, three are single and the remaining two are married. She has a son who works as a building worker in Poiy Pet City. Presently, Chhou S.’s business is running well, and it is a good time for making more profit, So that Chhou S. has decided to ask for fund from Kiva to purchase more fish-paste in the big amount than present time for sales.

loans.use: To purchase more fish-paste in the big amount than present time for sales.

loans.name: Yessenia Del Rosario

texts.es:
Yessenia tiene 21 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a sus padres en el distrito de Chulucanas, una zona agrícola que pertenece a la provincia de Morropón y se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a más de tres horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la venta de cerveza en su domicilio. Ella ofrece en venta a sus vecinos durante los fines de semana. El negocio le ayuda a solventar sus gastos personales y a apoyar a su familia con el sostenimiento de su economía diaria. Ella se esfuerza siempre por captar nuevos clientes brindando un buen trato. Gracias a ello durante el poco tiempo que lleva funcionando su negocio este ha podido contar con una clientela estable y fidelizada.

Yessenia desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más bebidas de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda con la que actualmente cuenta debido a la temporada de verano. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Yessenia is 21 years old, single, and lives together with her parents in Chulucanas district, an agricultural area of Morropón province, in Piura region, more than three and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

Yessenia sells beer from her home.  She offers her products for sale to her neighbors on weekends.  Her business helps her to cover her personal expenses and to support her family with their daily finances.  She is always working hard to attract new customers, providing them with good customer service.  Thanks to this, during the short time that she has been in business, she has managed to attract a stable and loyal customer base.

Yessenia would like to expand her business by purchasing more drinks so that she can meet her current demand during the summer season.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which will help her to achieve her goal.

loans.use: To buy more drinks so that she can meet her current demand

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene C. is from the village of Oroquieta City. She is 36 years old. Irene is single and has one school-aged child. To make a living, Irene owns & operates a business venture in the services sector operating transportation services. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from operating motor transport services. Irene has been engaged in her business for over two years and earns approximately 2000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2000, Irene joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Irene has successfully repaid a previous loan of 3000 PHP from GDMPC. Irene is requesting a new loan of 4000 PHP which will be used to repair existing vehicle for better service. This loan will be the tenth loan taken out by Irene from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of the borrower's family. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to repair existing vehicle for better service

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane D. is a married woman who lives in Brgy. Oguis, Danao City, Cebu. She earns her living by operating one business venture: general store business.  Her husband Edwin, who is 36 years old, works as a Geology Aid to earn his living.  They have three children who are between 10 to 15 years old. Mary Jane joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2009 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past 3 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Mary Jane has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 13,000 helped her earn a monthly profit of PHP 8,000, uplifting the family's standard of living.  This time, for her 4th loan, she is borrowing PHP 17,000, which she intends to use to buy soft drinks and other goods for the store so that she could continue to save up for the future improvement of business. Mary Jane D. is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 


About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed to a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking  the link to the   NWTF Kiva lending team  on Kiva.org to join our team.

loans.use: Purchase more general store stock to sell to customers

loans.name: Maria Soledad

texts.es:
María tiene 30 años de edad, es conviviente y reside junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito agrícola de Chulucanas, ubicada a más de tres horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque

Se dedica a vender productos cosméticos por catálogo, realizando dos campañas mensuales, de una empresa que le provee dichos productos. María también se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral como gallinas, pavos y patos, los cuales engorda y comercializa su carne entre los vecinos de la zona.  Los ingresos que ella percibe de estas actividades le sirven para sacar adelante a su familia y fortalecer su economía.
 
María desea adquirir aves, para su engorde y posterior comercialización.  Por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
María is 30 years old.  She lives with her common-law husband and children in the agricultural district of Chulucanas which is located more than three and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

María sells cosmetics through a catalog.  She makes two lots of sales a month for a company that provides her with these products.  María also raises poultry such as chickens, turkeys and ducks which she fattens and then sells as meat to her neighbors.  She uses the profits she makes from these business activities to get her family ahead in life and strengthen her finances.

María would like to acquire birds to fatten and then sell.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to help her achieve her goal.

loans.use: To buy animals to fatten and then sell

loans.name: Liny

texts.en:
Liny I. is from the village of Sinonoc, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She is 43 years old. Liny is married and has four school-aged children. To make a living, Liny owns and operates a business venture in the services sector operating transportation services. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from operating motorcycle transport services. Liny has been engaged in her business for over three years and earns approximately 2,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Liny joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Liny has successfully repaid a previous loan of 2,000 PHP from GDMPC. This previous loan was used to additional capital for her business. Liny is requesting a new loan of 10000 PHP which will be used to purchase tires and other accessories. This loan will be the third loan taken out by Liny from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand the borrower's business. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase tires and other accessories

loans.name: Sok

texts.en: Sok N. is 52 years old, married and devoted to three children; one is single, and the rest two are married, and they are employed as an office staff in the Benteay Meanchey province. Sok N. stays at home to manage the family housework as well as selling some fruit to her villagers for income. Sok N. is married but she is divorced from her husband for many years. Sok N. thinks that it is time to sustain her investment's growth and look for extra revenue, which she proposes to do by selling fruit at the market. She wants to buy a larger quantity of fruit to sell to retailers in the market. To achieve her plan, Sok N. is seeking for a loan to purchase more fruit for selling.

loans.use: To purchase more fruit for selling.

loans.name: Bonifacio

texts.en:
Bonifacio M. is from the village of Tonggo, Tudela, Misamis Occidental. He is 25 years old. Bonifacio is married and has one infant-aged children. To make a living, Bonifacio owns & operates a business venture in the services sector operating transportation services. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from operating motorcycle transport services. Bonifacio has been engaged in his business for over three years and earns approximately 2,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2011, Bonifacio joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Bonifacio is requesting a new loan of 6000 PHP which will be used to purchase tires and other accessories. This loan will be the first loan taken out by Bonifacio from GDMPC. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand the borrower's business. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase tires and other accessories

loans.name: Hem

texts.en: Hem S. is a single woman and mother. Hem S. is a professional teacher in her village, Banteay Meanchey province. She currently generates an income of approximately $5 per day by teaching at local school. She has no life a partner because she divorced from her husband for a few years ago. She has five kids, two of whom are single, and the three are married. Two of her children are working in various occupations, and they often contribute their income with her to use for daily expense. Currently, Hem S. says that she wants to buy a piece of land which it is the good location for building new house. She also expresses that her kids who have married already, they did not have their own house for living yet. So she wishes to buy this land for her kid to build new house. Because of this reason, Hem S. would like a loan from Kiva.

loans.use: To buy a piece of land for building new house.

loans.name: Huk's Group

texts.en:
Eight people are forming a village bank loan; they are located in Chek village in Kandal province. This village loan selected, Mrs. Huk S., 40 years old, as the village bank president.  Each member of this village will use their portions to support their different purpose. 

Mrs. Huk S. is a farmer who owns 3-hectares of land which she uses to cultivate rice for a living. With this farming, she lacks some money to grow it, so she decided to ask for a loan to buy rice seeds and fertilizers for cultivating rice. Her husband, Mr. Pek Savy, 42 years old, and he is an agri machine driver for salary and also support in his wife farming. This couple has four children who are student in the local school and also help their parent farming.

loans.use: To ask for a loan to buy rice seeds and fertilizers for cultivating rice.

loans.name: Khem's Group

texts.en:
This village bank loan consists of nine members; they are located in Chek village in Kandal province. This village selected, Mr. Khem K., 51 years old, as the village bank president. The members of this village hope that, they will increase their income to improve the family by these loans. 

Mr. Khem K. and his wife, Mrs. Keom Hong, are farmers who own a plot of land to cultivate rice for a living. With this faming, Mr. Khem K. would like to ask for a loan to buy rice seeds, fertilizers and gasoline to support his farming crop. This spouse has a child who is attending in the local school.

loans.use: To ask for a loan to buy rice seeds, fertilizers and gasoline to support his farming crop.

loans.name: Vann's Group

texts.en:
There are eight people are forming a village bank loan; they are living in Chek village in Kandal province. Mrs. Vann S., is 47 years old, and she is a village bank president having been selected by its members. While each member of this village will use their money to support their different purpose.

Mrs. Vann S. and her husband, Mr. Eab La, are farmers who own 4-hectares of land which they use to cultivate rice for a living. This spouse is working hard with the farm, but they still lake some money to grow their rice field. Thus, Mrs. Vann S. decided to ask for a loan to pay to purchase the water machines for pumping water to water rice plants. Aside from farmer, her husband also earns income by house constructing. This couple has three children; two are laborers and another is attending in a local school.

loans.use: To pay for hire the water machines for pumping water to water rice plants.

loans.name: Keo's Group

texts.en:
Ten people are forming a village bank loan; they are located in Chek village in Kandal province. This village selected, Mrs. Keo L., 41 years old, as the village bank president. The members of this village will use their portions to support their different purpose. 

Mrs. Keo L. is a widow, and she doesn’t have aN. children. She is a farmer who owns 2-hectares of land which she uses to cultivate rice for a living. She is a farmer who works very hard with this farming, but she still lacks some money to grow her rice.
